sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-card>
    <v-form class="card" @submit.prevent="onSubmit">
      <v-row class="pa-4">
      <v-col :cols="9">
        <v-autocomplete
          class="form-control"
          v-model="newPortfolio"
          :items="portfolioList"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          outlined dense
          label="Add a portfolio by typing a name"/>
      </v-col>
      <v-col :cols="3">
        <v-text-field
          label="Total portfolio value"
          single-line outlined dense
          type="number"
          v-model="portfolioAmount" />
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
        <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Add</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddInvestment",
  inject: ["platformId", "scenarioId"],
  data() {
    return {
      newPortfolio: {},
      portfolioAmount: null,
      portfolioList: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getPortfolioList() {
      let endpoint = `/api/portfoliotemplates/`;
      apiService(endpoint, "GET").then(data => {
        this.portfolioList = data.results;
      });
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newPortfolio) {
        let endpoint = `/api/scenarios/${this.scenarioId}/platforms/${this.platformId}/portfolios/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name: "override",
          template_id: this.newPortfolio,
          platform: this.platformId,
          model_value: this.portfolioAmount,
          auto_created: false,
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-portfolio", data);
          this.newPortfolio = null;
          this.portfolioAmount = null;
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must select a portfolio and enter a total amount";
      }
    }
  },
  created() {
    this.getPortfolioList();
  }
};
</script>
